items.name: Arcane Dissolver
items.effect: Dispels magical barriers and weakens enchantments on doors or chests.

items.name: Demolition Charge
items.effect: Breaks reinforced walls or rubble blocking paths. Cane used to deal huge damage to enemies

items.name: Fire Bomb
items.effect: Deals fire damage to a single target.

items.name: Flash Powder
items.effect: Blinds enemies in a radius for 2 turns, reducing their accuracy.

items.name: Stamina Tonic
items.effect: Restores 20% Stamina. Critical for extended exploration.

items.name: Strength Elixir
items.effect: Grants +30% STR for 3 turns. Perfect for breaking objects or bosses.

items.name: Smoke Bomb
items.effect: Allows escape from non-boss combat. Guaranteed retreat.
